text.zh: 上帝​说：“我们要​按照​我们​的​形象​造​人，使​他们​跟​我们​相似，让​他们​管理​海​里​的​鱼、天​上​会​飞​的​生物、各​种​牲畜​和​各​种​在​地​上​爬行​的​生物，管理​整个​大地。”
text.en: Then God said: “Let us make man in our image, according to our likeness, and let them have in subjection the fish of the sea and the flying creatures of the heavens and the domestic animals and all the earth and every creeping animal that is moving on the earth.”

text.zh: 上帝​赐​福​给​他们，对​他们​说：“要​繁衍​增多，遍满​地面，开拓​大地，也​要​管理海​里​的​鱼、天​上​会​飞​的​生物​和​地​上​的​各​种​动物。”
text.en: Further, God blessed them, and God said to them: “Be fruitful and become many, fill the earth and subdue it, and have in subjection the fish of the sea and the flying creatures of the heavens and every living creature that is moving on the earth.”

text.zh: 我​要​使​你和​女人互相​敌对，也​要​使​你​的​后代和​女人​的​后代互相​敌对。他会​打​碎你​的​头，你​会​咬​伤他​的​脚跟。”
text.en: And I will put enmity between you and the woman and between your offspring and her offspring. He will crush your head, and you will strike him in the heel.”

text.zh: 我​把​我​的​彩虹​放​在​云​中，作为​我​跟​大地​立约​的​凭证。
text.en: I put my rainbow in the cloud, and it will serve as a sign of the covenant between me and the earth.

text.zh: 家​里​没有​人​比​我​大。除了​你​之​外，他​什么​都​交​给​我​了，因为​你​是​他​的​妻子。我​怎么​可以​做​这么​坏​的​事，得罪​上帝​呢？”
text.en: There is no one greater in this house than I am, and he has not withheld from me anything at all except you, because you are his wife. So how could I commit this great badness and actually sin against God?”

text.zh: 我​让​你​活​到​现在，就是​要​向​你​显示​我​的​力量，让​我​的​名字​传​遍​天下。
text.en: But for this very reason I have kept you in existence: to show you my power and to have my name declared in all the earth.

text.zh: 除​我​以外，你​不可​有​别​的​神。
text.en: You must not have any other gods besides me.

text.zh: 耶和华​在​摩西​面前​经过，宣告​说：“耶和华，耶和华，是​怜悯​人、体恤​人的​上帝，不​轻易​发怒，有​忠贞​的​厚爱，极其​信实​可靠，
text.en: Jehovah was passing before him and declaring: “Jehovah, Jehovah, a God merciful and compassionate, slow to anger and abundant in loyal love and truth,

text.zh: 对​千​代​的​人​显​出​忠贞​的​爱，赦免​罪过、过错、罪恶，却​一定​会​惩罚​该​受罚​的​人，父亲​犯罪，子孙​都​要​承受​恶果，直到​三四​代。”
text.en: showing loyal love to thousands, pardoning error and transgression and sin, but he will by no means leave the guilty unpunished, bringing punishment for the error of fathers upon sons and upon grandsons, upon the third generation and upon the fourth generation.”

text.zh: “你​要​吩咐​以色列​所有​民众，告诉​他们：‘你们​要​圣洁，因为​我​耶和华​你们​的​上帝​是​圣洁​的。
text.en: “Speak to the entire assembly of the Israelites and tell them, ‘You should be holy, because I, Jehovah your God, am holy.

text.zh: 不可​报复，也​不可​对​人​怀恨​在心。要​爱​人​如​己。我​是​耶和华
text.en: “‘You must not take vengeance nor hold a grudge against the sons of your people, and you must love your fellow man as yourself. I am Jehovah.

text.zh: 不可​亵渎​我​的​圣名。你们​要​在​以色列人​当中​尊​我​为​圣。我​是​耶和华，我​使​你们​成圣。
text.en: You must not profane my holy name, and I must be sanctified in the midst of the Israelites. I am Jehovah, who is sanctifying you,
“May Jehovah bless you and safeguard you.

text.zh: 愿​耶和华​的​慈颜​光照​你，​施​恩​给​你。
text.en: May Jehovah make his face shine upon you, and may he favor you.

text.zh: 愿​耶和华​恩待​你，​赐​平安​给​你。”’
text.en: May Jehovah lift up his face toward you and grant you peace.”’

text.zh: 上帝​跟​世人​不​同，​不​会​说谎；​他​跟​凡人​不​一样，​不​会​改变​主意。​他​讲​过​的​话，哪​有​不​履行​的？​他​说​过​的​事，哪​有​不​实践​的？
text.en: God is not a mere man who tells lies, Nor a son of man who changes his mind. When he says something, will he not do it? When he speaks, will he not carry it out?

text.zh: 你​要​全心，全力，用​全部​生命爱​耶和华​你​的​上帝。
text.en: You must love Jehovah your God with all your heart and all your soul and all your strength.

text.zh: 今天​我​吩咐​你​的​这些​话，你​要​记​在​心​上，也​要​反复​教导​儿女，无论​坐​在​家​里​还是​走​在​路上，躺​下​还是​起来，都​要​教导​他们。
text.en: These words that I am commanding you today must be on your heart,and you must inculcate them in your sons and speak of them when you sit in your house and when you walk on the road and when you lie down and when you get up.

text.zh: 今天​我​以​天地​为​证，我​把​生命​和​死亡、福分​和​诅咒，都​摆​在​你​面前。你​要​选择​生命，这样​你​和​你​的​子孙才​能​活​下去；
text.en: I take the heavens and the earth as witnesses against you today that I have put life and death before you, the blessing and the curse; and you must choose life so that you may live, you and your descendants,
